main event: A 14-year-old observer reported seeing a light in the sky over Ridgewood Jr. High School in Shreveport, Louisiana, on May 31, 1957.
interesting points: The object was described as an oval shape with a white color and a red center., The object hovered and then flew off rapidly into a bright light before disappearing., The observer estimated the object's speed to be between 15,000 to 20,000 mph., The object was in sight for only a brief period of time while the weather conditions were clear., A hand-drawn sketch of the object was included, showing its movement and details.
